The Capuchin Monkeys

They are readily identified as the "organ grinder" monkey, and have been used in many movies and television shows.

  • Scientific Name:Cebinae
  • Average Weight: 2.9 – 3.9 kg.
  • Average Height: 34 – 45 cm.
  • Average Lifespan: 15 – 25 years (In the wild)

Capuchin monkey The capuchin monkeys are New World monkeys of the subfamily Cebinae. The range of capuchin monkeys includes some tropical forests in Central America and South America as far south as northern Argentina.
